title: Caltech Gets $750 Million Pledge for Sustainability, Climate Research
text:
The California Institute of Technology announced its largest-ever gift Thursday, a $750 million pledge from the family that owns Wonderful Co. aimed at enhancing and scaling research on environmental sustainability.

The gift, the second largest ever to a U.S. academic institution, will create a permanent endowment to fund studies across the Pasadena, Calif., school and the Jet Propulsion Laboratory, which Caltech manages for the National Aeronautics and Space Administration.
